title: Tony Bennett
summary: Anthony Dominick Benedetto (born August 3, 1926),[1] known professionally as Tony Bennett, is a retired American singer of traditional pop standards, big band, show tunes, and jazz. He is also a painter, having created works under his birth name that are on permanent public display in several institutions. He is the founder of the Frank Sinatra School of the Arts in Astoria, Queens, New York.[2]
